00059 void MiniHashTable::inithashtable() {
00060     int i;
00061     TSIZE = INITIAL_SIZE;
00062 
00063     numNodes = 0;
00064     hash = (MINIHASHREC **) malloc(sizeof(MINIHASHREC *) * TSIZE);
00065 
00066     for (i = 0; i < TSIZE; i++)
00067         hash[i] = (MINIHASHREC *) NULL;
00068 }

00109 void MiniHashTable::delete_key(char *w) {
00110     MINIHASHREC *htmp, *hprv;
00111     unsigned int hval = HASHFN(w, TSIZE, SEED);
00112 
00113     for (hprv = NULL, htmp = hash[hval]
00114     ; htmp != NULL && scmp(htmp->word, w) != 0; hprv = htmp, htmp = htmp->next) {
00115         ;
00116     }
00117 
00118     if (hprv == NULL)
00119         hash[hval] = htmp->next;
00120     else
00121         hprv->next = htmp->next;
00122 
00123     free(htmp->word);
00124     numNodes--;
00125     //    free(htmp);
00126     htmp = NULL;
00127 }

00133 MINIHASHREC *
00134 MiniHashTable::hashsearch(char *w) {
00135     MINIHASHREC *htmp, *hprv;
00136     unsigned int hval = HASHFN(w, TSIZE, SEED);
00137 
00138     for (hprv = NULL, htmp = hash[hval]
00139     ; htmp != NULL && scmp(htmp->word, w) != 0; hprv = htmp, htmp = htmp->next) {
00140         ;
00141     }
00142 
00143     if (hprv != NULL && htmp != NULL) /* move to front on access */
00144     {
00145         hprv->next = htmp->next;
00146         htmp->next = hash[hval];
00147         hash[hval] = htmp;
00148     }
00149 
00150     return (htmp);
00151 }

00153 /* Search hash table for given string, insert if not found
00154  * @param w Description of the param.
00155  * @return The expected result
00156  */
00157 MINIHASHREC*
00158 MiniHashTable::hashinsert(char *w) {
00159     MINIHASHREC *htmp, *hprv;
00160 
00161     unsigned int hval = HASHFN(w, TSIZE, SEED);
00162 
00163     for (hprv = NULL, htmp = hash[hval]
00164     ; htmp != NULL && scmp(htmp->word, w) != 0; hprv = htmp, htmp = htmp->next) {
00165         ;
00166     }
00167 
00168     if (htmp == NULL) {
00169 
00170         htmp = (MINIHASHREC *) malloc(sizeof(MINIHASHREC));
00171 
00172         htmp->word = (char *) malloc(strlen(w) + 1);
00173         strcpy(htmp->word, w); //copy the value
00174 
00175 
00176         htmp->id = globalId;
00177         if (useAsCount == false) {
00178             globalId++;
00179         }
00180 
00181         numNodes++;
00182         htmp->next = NULL;
00183 
00184         if (hprv == NULL)
00185             hash[hval] = htmp;
00186         else
00187             hprv->next = htmp;
00188 
00189         /* new records are not moved to front */
00190     } else {
00191 
00192         if (hprv != NULL) /* move to front on access */
00193         {
00194             hprv->next = htmp->next;
00195             htmp->next = hash[hval];
00196             hash[hval] = htmp;
00197         }
00198 
00199     }
00200 
00201     return htmp;
00202 }

00253 /* Search hash table for given string, insert if not found, increase id if found.
00254  * @param w Description of the param.
00255  * @return The expected result
00256  */
00257 MINIHASHREC*
00258 MiniHashTable::hashupdate(char *w) {
00259     MINIHASHREC *htmp, *hprv;
00260 
00261     unsigned int hval = HASHFN(w, TSIZE, SEED);
00262 
00263     for (hprv = NULL, htmp = hash[hval]
00264     ; htmp != NULL && scmp(htmp->word, w) != 0; hprv = htmp, htmp = htmp->next) {
00265         ;
00266     }
00267 
00268     if (htmp == NULL) {
00269 
00270         htmp = (MINIHASHREC *) malloc(sizeof(MINIHASHREC));
00271 
00272         htmp->word = (char *) malloc(strlen(w) + 1);
00273         strcpy(htmp->word, w); //copy the value
00274 
00275 
00276         htmp->id = globalId;
00277         if (useAsCount == false) {
00278             globalId++;
00279         }
00280 
00281         numNodes++;
00282         htmp->next = NULL;
00283 
00284         if (hprv == NULL)
00285             hash[hval] = htmp;
00286         else
00287             hprv->next = htmp;
00288 
00289         /* new records are not moved to front */
00290     } else {
00291         htmp->id = htmp->id + 1;
00292 
00293         if (hprv != NULL) /* move to front on access */
00294         {
00295             hprv->next = htmp->next;
00296             htmp->next = hash[hval];
00297             hash[hval] = htmp;
00298         }
00299 
00300     }
00301 
00302     return htmp;
00303 }

00308 void MiniHashTable::dump() {
00309     int i;
00310     MINIHASHREC *ptr;
00311 
00312     for (i = 0; i < TSIZE; i++) {
00313         for (ptr = hash[i]; ptr != NULL; ptr = ptr->next) {
00314             // ptr stores current element in the iteration
00315 
00316         }
00317     }
00318 }
00319 
00320 /* Bitwise hash function.  Note that tsize does not have to be prime.
00321  * @param word Description of the param.
00322  * @param tsize Description of the param.
00323  * @param seed Description of the param.
00324  * @return The expected result
00325  */
00326 unsigned int MiniHashTable::bitwisehash(char *word, int tsize,
00327         unsigned int seed) {
00328     char c;
00329     unsigned int h;
00330 
00331     h = seed;
00332     for (; (c = *word) != '\0'; word++) {
00333         h ^= ((h << 5) + c + (h >> 2));
00334     }
00335     return ((unsigned int) ((h & 0x7fffffff) % tsize));
00336 }
00337 
00343 int MiniHashTable::scmp(char *s1, char *s2) {
00344     while (*s1 != '\0' && *s1 == *s2) {
00345         s1++;
00346         s2++;
00347     }
00348     return (*s1 - *s2);
00349 }
00350 
00352 MiniHashTable::~MiniHashTable() {
00353     for (int i = 0; i < TSIZE; i++) {
00354         MINIHASHREC* ptr;
00355         while (hash[i] != NULL) {
00356             ptr = hash[i]->next;
00357 
00358             free(hash[i]->word);
00359 
00360             //if (hash[i]->from != NULL) free(hash[i]->from);
00361             free( hash[i]);
00362             hash[i] = ptr;
00363         }
00364     }
00365 
00366     free( hash);
00367 }

00372 int MiniHashTable::size() {
